dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright violations]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, September 27, 2004 9:34 AM
To: Legal Response
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright violations]

Forwarding to Legal for review.


-------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] Copyright violations
Date:         Sun, 26 Sep 2004 18:26:47 EDT
From:         LadyhawkesStar@aol.com
To:         abuse@theplanet.com, admin@theplanet.com, temon@myself.com



A website registered by a native of India, www.egyptclub.net is in
violation of copyright laws, having posted a number of items in its
forums that are mine. One of their posters is not only claiming
ownership but she is also drawing bandwidth from my site in republishing
my material. The copyright notice was clear on each page, she removed it
before posting it publically. I believe this web address is hosted
through your server.

I have written the administrator who's email is included above but I
fear it is a fake address. Can you help me? I will be glad to fax you a
notarized document with my claim to the above.

Brenda Hager
Huntington, WV USA

Your address was obtained through a neotrace search. If it is in error
and this site is not hosted by your server, then please excuse this email.

"We learn from what hurts us as much as from what loves us"

-- 
Thanks,
Garrett White
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
